mapper.sql: data_source_id, data_source, source_name, app_id, auth_id, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user
mapper.insert: insert into t_data_source (data_source_id, data_source, source_name, app_id, auth_id, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user) values (#{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_data_source
data_source_id,
data_source,
source_name,
app_id,
auth_id,
valid_flag,
created_date,
created_user,
updated_date,
updated_user,

mapper.update:
update t_data_source
data_source = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_name = #{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_data_source set data_source = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_name = #{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_data_source
and data_source like CONCAT('%', #{dataSource}, '%')
and source_name like CONCAT('%', #{sourceName}, '%')
and valid_flag = #{validFlag}
